name: Moon Knight ğŸŒ™
ability: A Townsfolk starts as a Target. Each night*, you learn a non-Target and choose a player, if you choose the Target player, you both die and you win (ignoring protection/drunkenness/poison). [You winning doesn't end the game and when you die you lose your Dead Vote]

name: Tsukuyomi ğŸŒ™

name: Magistrate ğŸŒ™
ability: Each night*, you learn who Tsuki-Yomi chose first, they die unless you choose to save them, if you do, 2 other players (not the Demon) die. You are safe from death at night and if you die, your team loses.

otherNightReminder: Choose 2 players: the first dies if a living Townsfolk performed a ritual today, otherwise both die.
name: Amaterasu â˜€ï¸
ability: Each day, players may publicly enact a ritual. Townsfolk who do so are poisoned until dusk. Each night*, choose 2 players: the first dies if a living Townsfolk performed a ritual today, otherwise both die. [Rituals still poison when you are not in play]

ability: Each night*, choose 2 players, they die and a player wakes and learns something true.
